Did I mention she picks apart even the most robust, well constructed project with pure joy and has exams that you can't finish in the alloted time even if you could cut and paste?
No Comments
too much work, often extended b/c notes in classes are insufficient; most students have computer programming background; can be intimitated to new comers
Good, clear notes. Midterm was a bit hard; barely enough time to finish.
way too much work for this course. exams were fairly easy but quizes were just retarded. assignments were way too time consuming.

Encourages questions in class.  She speaks in a slow, comfortable pace... doesn't babbles on.  All PowerPoint notes, so she makes a lot of hand gestures in the air and doesn't write things down on the overhead... maybe difficult for some students to grasp material this way.  Very challenging assignments.  Fair midterm.  Very knowledgeable.
Janice was great, yes she might be a bit monotone, but she does explain things very slowly and is willing to repeat herself until everyone understands. Quizes add up to an easy mark, exams very fair.

Good for 1 on 1 help if you go to her office hours, quizes weren't great and the assignments, midterms and finals were fair. 
 
 Lecture it's hard to understand her.
 
 One time a few people were watching a bee fly around the room and around her head. They were more intersted in the bee than lecture

To bad she can't keep anyone awake.  But she is really nice and willing to help.  Quizes suck but force you to try and stay awake. Don't bother with e-mails, she will never get back to you.  She always changes her notes after she gives them out, always have to double check printed copy with her copy

I don't know why so many are whining but she's excellent! she's enthusiastic about the ultra boring material and always smiling the quizez are a good idea cuz if everybody likcs at a quiz she goes over the material again. course is interesting but oh oh soooooo boring! Excellent teacher overall
dont take 371 if she teaches it...

She is very enthusiastic about what she is teaching and very helpful in office hour! Frankly speaking, her course is a bit hard,ie. lectures are pretty basic while some of the assignments are tough. However, the midterm and final are fair.

Well, I dont like her much before but this course really changed me. She's a nice lecturer who enjoy teaching. When I got a question, she just offers her sincerest help! Even thought I didn't do good on her final and midterm, she makes this course pretty easy to follow and i did learn alot! Thanks!
dont take her, run...
Somehow she can make me fall asleep every time regardless how hard I try to stay awake
terrible teacher
weekly quizes suked ... not recommended
at least the lecture chairs were comfortable to sleep in....
Your pillow will need a pillow

I'll just say what they said is true.
spent 2/3 of her class talking about Physics! You will realize at the end that you just went through a Physics course!
NO COMMENT !!!
Boring
Teaches from the text, and easily gets flustered and nervous.
No Comments
Very enthusiastic about the course material.  Sometimes comes across as disorganized.  Seems to get caught with details in the lectures at the expense of not conveying the concepts of the course.

Introduction... HA!!! If you have no previous java programming experience you will painfully regret taking this course... at least with this prof. She has some breathing problem and needs to take breaks bet/ words, it creates a lot of ambiguity.
boring as hell
Make a Computer course beome a Physic course, make everyone sleep. I count 90%+ sleeping/day dreaming

if you have previously learned java before, take this course. otherwise, don't! you can't expect to hear what she says in class because nothing makes sense and you can't help but fall asleep. One time she even told us to wake up. Hard and long assignments
Ahh the course sucks and she makes it sooo much harder by giving long (i mean looong) assignments and who knows about the exams
she seems quite nervous and blushes much... i find it quite hard to listen to someone that pauses at every word.  i think she might be new.
